channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Hovering your mouse over a link for a site preview
channel.description:
I think we should be able to generate a site preview before clicking a link i.e when you hover your mouse over a link it will show a preview before hand. They have a similar feature on word press.
Edit: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/swiftpreview/nphfkpgklibhnhgegdblhnhicgfginnj
